comments.body: This is a bug fix. `withGlobalTempView()` doesn't remove global temp view if it is called with full path: `withGlobalTempView("global_temp.v2")`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +223,227 @@
      val v2 = s"${spark.sharedState.globalTempViewManager.database}.v2"
      withGlobalTempView("v2") {
        sql(s"CREATE GLOBAL TEMP VIEW v2 AS SELECT * FROM $t")
        cacheRelation(v2)
